definitions.definition: The act of immigrating ; the passing or coming into a country of which one is not native born for the purpose of permanent residence.
The process of going through immigration checks at a border checkpoint .
examples: It took ages to get through immigration last time.

main_definition: The act of immigrating ; the passing or coming into a country of which one is not native born for the purpose of permanent residence.
secondary_definitions: The process of going through immigration checks at a border checkpoint .
